name: Flashcards
description: Flip cards for term-definition memorization. Perfect for vocabulary learning, term memorization, and quick review.

ai_input_format.description: AI should generate a JSON object with a title and cards array

schema.title: string - Title for the flashcard deck

cards.front: string - Term or question on front of card
cards.back: string - Definition or answer on back of card
The powerhouse of the cell that produces ATP through cellular respiration.
The control center of the cell containing genetic material (DNA).
Organelle in plant cells where photosynthesis occurs.

cards.answer: The powerhouse of the cell that produces ATP through cellular respiration.
The control center of the cell containing genetic material (DNA).
Organelle in plant cells where photosynthesis occurs.

conversion_notes.html_escaping: Escape HTML special characters in text fields
conversion_notes.tips: Optional tip field can be added for hints
